name: @~lisfan/vue-upyun-image-clipper
description: vue过滤器插件-又拍云图片裁剪器：根据DPR尺寸处理显示的图片大小

scripts.pub-pre: git pull && npm update && npm version prerelease && git add . && git commit -m 'updata: update version' && git push
scripts.pub-n: npm run pub-pre && npm publish --tag nightly
scripts.pub-a: npm run pub-pre && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.pub-b: npm run pub-pre && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.pub-rc: npm run pub-pre && npm publish --tag rc
scripts.pub-s: npm run pub-pre && npm publish --tag stable

author: lisfan <goolisfan@gmail.com> (https://www.npmjs.com/~lisfan)
